titleStmt.title: The VVorchester-shire petition to the Parliament for the Ministry of England defended, by a minster of Christ in that county; in answer to XVI queries, printed in a book, called, A brief discovery of the threefold estate of Antichrist: whereunto is added, XVII. counter-queries, and an humble monition to Parliament, people, and ministers.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Vnderhill at the Blue Anchor in Paul's Church-Yard: and Francis Tyton at the Three Daggers in Fleetstreet.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Blue Anchor in Paul's Church-Yard:
